item.title: Lean option and Hydrate method in Mongoose
item.description: Lean and Hydrate in Mongoose Lean option on Query Typically, when returning data from the database as an API response, the virtuals/methods available on a mongoose document are unnecessary. Lean option can be set on such queries to return just the data directly from the database. This also improves the overall performance of the API. Documents returned from queries with the lean option enabled are plain javascript objects, not MongooseDocuments.
